ygData.subject: RE: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Someone wrote a program to parse the spell effect data file that Verant sends out with each new patch involving spell changes. You can also find similar
ygData.messageBody:
> I was wondering how do you know all of this? Is the song on the test server
> or out on live server already? This is a great song. Ahh I love being a
> bard. ;P

Someone wrote a program to parse the spell effect data file that
Verant sends out with each new patch involving spell changes.

You can also find similar information on the EQSS Spells Database.

http://eq.stratics.com/spells/

(If you log onto the test server your spell data file will be
patched and you can see the new song/spell data)

This just gave me an idea too... We can take all the bard songs
and after a new spell data file comes down to our computers then
run some sort of program on the two files, old and new, and see
what changed. read: what secretly changed.

Harmonic!
